newsitem.title: USA: Streicher Mobile raises $6.1 mln in offer.
newsitem.headline: Streicher Mobile raises $6.1 mln in offer.

text.p: Streicher Mobile Fueling Inc said on Thursday it raised $6,125,000 from the initial public offering of one million shares of common stock and warrants to buy an additional million shares.
All of the shares of common stock and warrants were offered by the company, it said.
Proceeds will be used for fuel truck and equipment purchases and the balance for working capital and other corporate purposes, Streicher said.

Argent Securities Inc was the managing underwriter of the offering, Streicher said. Streicher Mobile said it has granted the underwriter an over-allotment option to purchase up to 150,000 shares of common stock and 150,000 warrants.
